BREAKING: Newly Declassified Top Secret Emails Show Clapper Pushed to “Compromise” Normal Procedures to Rush 2017 ICA Report Newly declassified emails from December 22, 2016 show former DNI James Clapper pushed to “compromise” normal procedures to rush the 2017 ICA report on the Russia hoax.
